a hidden gem of an oldschool rpg in huge and unforgiving rough world party of heroes have to made their way in this game you should pay close attention to your heroes development cause its possible to end up with useless party in late game especially on higher difficulties graphics are fine for indie game story is ok gameplay is marvelous its defenitely not for everyone but must have for diehard fans of 90s crpg

edit  changed my review but only just recommend it and after i changed my build  it is unbalanced and very dependent on your character builds  one stat stands out  speed  the others are secondary which limits game style and game play  there are many guides to types of characters to use so i wont go into details  get it on a special deal

youll enjoy this game if 1 you think that autolevel up makes no sense if it level ups your enemies as well 2 you like being rewarded for doing something really challenging  challenging combat 3 you do not like absolutely obvious and straightforward games as there is no fun in solving obvious things 4 like that your action matters 5 do not care about graphics too much and more interested in mechanics 6 like longer games

good little rpg with functional graphics and a nice story game is quite hard and punishing if u dont level up correctly ye level up speed every level using a balance mod from the steam workshop made this game much more enjoyable for meim using qol improvement mod specially because of the food mechanic present in this game which is very bad imo overall game has its flaws but its fun

a combination of might and magic 3 and baldurs gate 1 is interesting with an initial steep difficulty that might turn casual players off  magic is generally underpowered at the highest levels where the speed statistic is godlikestatus  voice acting is painfully slow and unconvincing used for intermissions between chapters  ending is painfully lame and cheap  rumor of a sequel but unlikely

it is really a fun rpg game but it could have been better i ll go with the cons straight 1 grinding there is too much grinding in the game and if you skip grinding then you gonna be so under leveled  2 story does not exist  3 food management food becomes tiresome the more progress into the game basically every fight or two you have to rest and consume food  cant recommend as grinding is too much and a requirement to finish the game the grinding is overwhelming
